Major_Arcs.title: Circus Arc and Billings' Conflict
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc introduces the circus setting, Paul Bunyan as a strongman, and the initial conflict with Billings, leading to Paul's unexpected role as a hero.

sub_scenes.title: Circus Performance and Arrival
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene introduces Paul Bunyan's circus act and the arrival of the circus in town, setting the stage and initial characters.

sub_scenes.title: Billings' Threat and Intervention
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts the man in checkered shirt investigating a disturbance and encountering Billings, leading to a physical confrontation.

sub_scenes.title: Owner's Offer and Paul's New Role
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene resolves the Billings conflict, introduces the circus owner, and leads to the owner offering Paul Bunyan a job as the new strongman.

Major_Arcs.title: Grasso's Revenge and Paul's Heroism
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc focuses on Matto Grasso's vengeful schemes against Paul Bunyan and the circus, and Paul's heroic interventions to thwart them.

sub_scenes.title: Arson Attempt
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts Grasso's envy and plan to set the circus tent on fire, and Paul Bunyan's immediate response to extinguish the flames.

narrative_arcs.title: Paul Bunyan's Acclaim and Grasso's Envy

sub_scenes.title: Ape Release and Capture
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene shows Grasso's second revenge plan to release an ape, and Paul Bunyan's intervention to recapture it, leading to a chase.

narrative_arcs.title: The Ape's Release and the Keeper's Reaction

Major_Arcs.title: Chase, Confrontation, and Paul's Departure
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc covers the chase after Grasso, the confrontation between Paul (Sonny) and Grasso, and Paul's ultimate decision to leave the circus despite being offered a permanent role.

sub_scenes.title: Arena Chase and Obstruction
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene focuses on the chase unfolding in the arena and attempts to obstruct Grasso, highlighting the dynamic pursuit.

sub_scenes.title: Confrontation and Resolution
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts the physical confrontation between Paul and Grasso, culminating in Grasso's capture and Paul's job offer and subsequent rejection.

Major_Arcs.title: Marco Polo and the Ogress of Tibet
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc follows Marco Polo's adventure in Tibet, his encounter with a talking head, and his entrapment by the Ogress.

sub_scenes.title: Tibetan Encounter and Talking Head
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene introduces Marco Polo in Tibet, his encounter with mysterious figures, and the discovery of a talking severed head.

sub_scenes.title: Guidance and Hi-toun's Mourning
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene involves the talking head's guidance, leading Marco Polo to Hi-toun and discovering its hidden mourning.

narrative_arcs.title: The Talking Head's Gratitude and Guidance

sub_scenes.title: Ogress's Castle Trap
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts Marco Polo's arrival in Hi-toun, his offer to help, and his subsequent encounter and entrapment by the Ogress in her castle.

narrative_arcs.title: Marco Polo Arrives in Mourning Hi-toun and Offers Assistance
Encounter with the Distressed Woman and the Suspicious Castle
Entering the Mysterious Castle and Unmasking the Ogress
Confrontation with the Ogress and Her Tusked Mice

Major_Arcs.title: Swordsman's Capture
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc concisely depicts the swordsman's unsuccessful attempt to escape and his capture by a cloaked figure using snakes.

sub_scenes.title: Capture by Snakes
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene details the swordsman's confrontation, failed escape, and eventual capture and restraint by a cloaked figure using snakes.

Major_Arcs.title: Princess Lotus's Dungeon Rescue
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc portrays the imprisonment of Princess Lotus and another young man by an ogre, and their daring escape using a magic knife.

sub_scenes.title: Ogre's Captivity and Weapon Discovery
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene sets up the captivity by an ogre, the threat of being eaten, and the discovery of a weapon - a magic knife.

narrative_arcs.title: Despair and Discovery of a Weapon

sub_scenes.title: Escape and Royal Reunion
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene details the escape from the dungeon using the magic knife and the subsequent reunion with Princess Lotus's father, the King.

narrative_arcs.title: Dungeon Escape and Journey to Father
Palace Arrival, Reunion, and Refused Reward

Major_Arcs.title: The Treasure of Agra and Betrayal
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc tells the story of the Agra treasure, the deal between a prisoner and a captain, and the ensuing betrayal and revenge.

sub_scenes.title: Prologue and Penal Colony Setting
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene sets the stage with a prologue by the Treasure Keeper and introduces the setting in a British penal colony.

sub_scenes.title: Negotiation and Deceptive Agreement
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts the prisoner negotiating with Captain Brooking, revealing the treasure of Agra and reaching a deceptive agreement.

narrative_arcs.title: Map Exchange and Promise of Freedom

sub_scenes.title: Betrayal and Jordan's Revenge Vow
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene reveals Captain Brooking's betrayal, Jordan's imprisonment, and his eventual release and vow for revenge.

narrative_arcs.title: Return to England and Renewed Vow of Revenge

sub_scenes.title: Confrontation and Deadly Treasure
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts Jordan confronting Brooking, leading to a deadly confrontation in the attic over the treasure.

narrative_arcs.title: Violent Confrontation and Claim of Victory
Moral of the Story: Money is Evil

Major_Arcs.title: Dr. Styx and the Haunted Matthews Estate
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc centers on Dr. Styx's investigation of the haunted Matthews estate, confronting the vengeful ghost of Vincent Matthews, and achieving resolution through forgiveness and love.

sub_scenes.title: Introduction and Sentencing of Vincent Matthews
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene introduces Dr. Styx's intervention and the courtroom setting where Vincent Matthews is sentenced to death for murder.

sub_scenes.title: Hiring Dr. Styx and Entering the Haunted Estate
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene shows the realtor hiring Dr. Styx to investigate the haunted Matthews estate and Dr. Styx's arrival at the ominous location.

narrative_arcs.title: The Realtor and the Supernatural Expert Discuss the Matthews Estate
Arrival at the Haunted Matthews Place
Ignoring the Warning and Entering the Haunted House

sub_scenes.title: Confrontation with Vincent's Ghost
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts Dr. Styx's initial encounter and escalating confrontation with the ghostly Vincent Matthews inside the haunted house.

narrative_arcs.title: Confrontation with the Ghostly Figure Inside the House
Unwavering Confrontation and Declaration of Intent

sub_scenes.title: Physical Fight with the Ghost
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene details the physical fight between Dr. Styx and Vincent's ghost, highlighting the struggle and Dr. Styx's surprising strength.

narrative_arcs.title: Desperate Struggle and Reversal of Fortune

sub_scenes.title: Resolution through Forgiveness and Love
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene resolves the haunting through dialogue, forgiveness from Rosalind, and brotherly love, freeing Vincent's tormented spirit.

narrative_arcs.title: Questioning Violence, Fear, and the Path to Salvation
The Revelation of Rosalind's Murder and Fate

sub_scenes.title: Farewell and Return to Mundane
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene concludes the supernatural encounter with Vincent and Rosalind's departure and Dr. Styx's return to the normal world, offering a vague explanation to the old man.

Major_Arcs.title: Henry Hudson's Ill-Fated Voyages
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc narrates Henry Hudson's repeated attempts to find the Northwest Passage, his initial voyage under the Dutch, and his final, tragic voyage ending in mutiny and being set adrift.

sub_scenes.title: Mission Proposal and Acceptance (First Voyage)
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene introduces Henry Hudson and the Dutch East India Company's proposal for him to find the Northwest Passage to China.

narrative_arcs.title: The Enigma of Henry Hudson's Last Voyage
The Dutch East India Company's Proposal to Captain Hudson

sub_scenes.title: First Voyage and Disappointment
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts Hudson's first voyage, initial crew discontent, the hopeful entry into the Hudson River, and the eventual disappointment and return to Holland.

narrative_arcs.title: Entering the Hudson River with Hope
Disillusionment and the Decision to Turn Back

sub_scenes.title: Second Voyage and Mutiny
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene covers Hudson's second voyage, the initial optimism, being trapped in ice, growing despair, and the eventual mutiny and Hudson being set adrift.

narrative_arcs.title: Trapped in Ice and Growing Despair
The Ice Melts and Voyage Resumes

Major_Arcs.title: The Arabian Knight vs. The Tartars
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc tells the tale of Hassan, the Arabian Knight, tasked with rescuing a kidnapped girl from the Tartar leader Kurgan, culminating in a trial by combat and a peaceful resolution.

sub_scenes.title: Introduction and Mission Briefing
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene introduces the Arabian Knight, the Tartar threat, and Hassan receiving his mission from the Caliph to rescue a kidnapped daughter.

narrative_arcs.title: The Arabian Knight's Introduction and the Tartar Threat
Summoned by the Caliph for a Rescue Mission

sub_scenes.title: Journey and Encounter with Traveler
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene follows Hassan's journey through the desert, his arrival at a deserted oasis, and his encounter with a traveler who warns him of the Tartar danger.

narrative_arcs.title: The Journey to the Oasis of El-Sholem
Deserted Oasis and Discovery of Tartar Trail
Encounter and Warning from a Traveler
Offer of Water and Doubt on the Mission

sub_scenes.title: Camp Infiltration and Capture
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts Hassan infiltrating the Tartar camp, subduing a sentry, finding the prisoner's location, but ultimately getting discovered and captured.

narrative_arcs.title: Ambush and Subjugation of the Sentry

sub_scenes.title: Trial by Combat and Resolution
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts Kurgan's challenge of trial by combat, the fights themselves where Hassan is defeated but another warrior wins, and Kurgan honoring his word.

sub_scenes.title: Resolution and Romantic Farewell
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene concludes the Arabian Knight's story with Kurgan honoring his word and departing peacefully, and Hassan and the rescued woman sharing a romantic farewell.

narrative_arcs.title: Kurgan Keeps His Word and Bids Farewell
Woman Explains the Kiss and Praises Hassan
